# 문제 1
**정규분포 pdf 값을 계산하는 자신만의 파이썬 함수를 정의하고, 정규분포 mu = 3, sigma = 2 의 pdf를 그릴 것.**

::: {#68cb71d7 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy.stats import norm
import math

def Norm(x, mu, sigma):
    return (1/(sigma * np.sqrt(2 * np.pi))) * np.exp(-0.5 * ((x - mu) / sigma)**2)
k=np.linspace(-7,13,100)

my_n=Norm(k,3,2)

plt.plot(k,my_n)
plt.show()
plt.clf()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/cell-2-output-1.png){width=587 height=411}
:::


# 문제 2
**파이썬 scipy 패키지 사용해서 다음과 같은 확률을 구하시오.**

- X ~ N(2, 3^2)

- 1) P(X < 3)

::: {#84c3a359 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(3, loc=2, scale=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
np.float64(0.6305586598182363)
```
:::
:::


- 2) P(2 < X < 5)

::: {#61924ed1 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(5, loc=2, scale=3)-norm.cdf(2, loc=2, scale=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
np.float64(0.3413447460685429)
```
:::
:::


- 3) P(X < 3 or X > 7)

::: {#7765c149 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(3, loc=2, scale=3)+1-norm.cdf(7, loc=2, scale=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
```
np.float64(0.6783490120910509)
```
:::
:::


# 문제 3
**LS 빅데이터 스쿨 학생들의 중간고사 점수는 평균이 30이고, 분산이 4인 정규분포를 따른다. 상위 5%에 해당하는 학생의 점수는?**

::: {#bed9152f .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
score=norm.ppf(0.95, loc=30, scale=2)
print(score)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
33.28970725390295
```
:::
:::
